attributes.action: Raise the minimum earning threshold before repaying student loan debt from £15,000 in line with inflation in the same way that the size of the debt is increased.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The size of the overall student debt of a graduate/undergraduate is increased in line with the RPI (retail prices index) to reflect inflation, however the minimum earnings threshold has remained at £15,000 per annum for a number of years now.
This is unfair and the minimum earnings threshold should be increased to reflect the increase in the RPI since the threshold was last reviewed.
